topics.body:
I'm almost a hundred chapters into Psyren, and I just realized something.
[spoiler]Despite having the makings of a fantastic battle manga, the series has only had 2 or 3 big fights. The author seems to be putting more emphasis on the mystery of Psyren rather than the action.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Good morning. I've calmed down a lot so I'm not in a warpath anymore. I'm still going to talk to them though. But if they knock the laurel leaf from my hand, maybe they'll respond better with the sword.
